title: Addressing Weak Authentication like RFID, NFC in EVs and EVCs using AI-powered Adaptive Authentication
summary: The rapid expansion of the Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Electric Vehicle Charging Systems (EVCs) has introduced new cybersecurity challenges, specifically in authentication protocols that protect vehicles, users, and energy infrastructure.
